==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|げ|す|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
The compound of [[下]] ([[inferior]]) + [[司]] ([[official]]).

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|げす}}

# {{sense|archaic}} an [[inferior]] [[official]]; a [[petty]] official
# an inferior [[person]]; a petty person
#: '''下司'''の後知恵。
#:: A '''petty person''' becomes wiser after an event.
# a [[male]] [[dog]] ([[figuratively]], [[to]] [[express]] [[one's]] [[disgust]])

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|上司|じょうし}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|inferior official}} {{ja-r|下僚|かりょう}}, {{ja-r|下吏|かり}}, {{ja-r|賎吏|せんり}}
* {{sense|inferior person}} {{ja-r|賎|しず}}, {{ja-r|下っ端|したっぱ}}, {{ja-r|賎人|せんじん}}

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|male dog}} {{ja-r|売女|ばいた}}
